name: Muireann Skull Bag
description:
This is fun and fashion forward leather bag is sure to scream statement and turn heads in the office. 

It is ideal for adding personality to any outfit and is just one of the fabulous limited edition designs featured, with only 10 ever being made.

Smaller and neater than a standard briefcase, this bag would comfortably fit a small laptop of Ipad. This bag has a removable and adjustable long shoulder strap which can allow the wearer to carry the bag comfortable across the body or over the shoulder.

The inside features two large pouch pockets for all your bits and pieces ,as well as a large secure inner zipped pocket. The pockets are trimmed with leather on the inside and the lining is made from a very hardware silver coloured polyester lining.

Height: 26cm
Length: 32cm
Depth: 10cm
Strap Drop: adjustable in length

name: Aoife Bag
description:
The Aoife bag is a beautiful matte teal leather bag, trimmed with grey snake print and deep purple leather. This compact beauty features contrasting purple top stitching, tying the on- trend colours together. 

It has also been made in a blue, tan and red colour way and we think this gives the bag a Vintage feel.

Handcrafted out of the finest Italian cow hide, this bag has a soft and supple quality. It has two compartments; one zipped at the back and the other which is open at the top. 

This bag can be worn across the body making it perfect for daywear and travelling, equally it can add a dash of colour to a night out. There is an adjustable shoulder strap which can be altered at ease with the buckle.

On the inside there are two large leather trimmed pouch pockets, as well as a secure inner zipped pocket. The lining is constructed out of silver coloured polyester making it super hard wearing.

Dimensions:
Height: 16cm
Length: 26cm
Width: 6cm
Strap Drop: Adjustable in length

name: Vivian Bow Bag
description:
Vivian bow bag is the perfect way to embrace your inner boho. It is made from beautiful black soft cow leather with an accent of tan leather. It is also available in a rust red trimmed with the tan leather, a perfect partner to those autumnal days.

For ultimate style and comfort, this bag is best worn wrapped around the body. On the inside there are two large pouch pockets and a secure zipped pocket to help keep you organised. 

A secure zipped pocket can also be found at the back of the bag.  The lining is constructed from hard wearing silver coloured polyester.

Handmade from the finest Italian leather, all Ana Faye designs are crafted here in Sligo, on the scenic West Coast of Ireland and are guaranteed limited edition pieces- often one of each is ever made.

Dimensions:
Height: 32cm
Length: 45cm
Width: 12cm
Strap Drop: 43cm

name: Leigh Bag
description:
The beautiful Leigh bag is a brand new style from Ana Faye. 

The bag is available in this rich colour way of rust red complemented with tan, a beautiful teal trimmed with grey anaconda print leather and a sumptuous chocolate brown trimmed with bronze sparkle dust leather. All perfect tones for carrying through Autumn/ Winter and beyond.

It is an ideal design for women, who like a good medium size bag and fits comfortably under ones arm. It houses an extra pocket on the reverse, which is ideal for when travelling or shopping in the city. 

On the inside there are two large pouch style pockets as well as a secure zipped pocket. The silver polyester lining is hard wearing and durable.

Dimensions:
Height: 29cm
Length: 27cm
Width: 10cm
Strap: 29cm

name: Rosey Backpack
description:
We are just loving this backpack here as its so comfy to wear!

Rosy brown leather trimmed with bronze is a beautiful one of design, which is available in another eye catching colour way of on trend purple leather trimmed with olive wet look leather.

Because of the soft leather used in this design it make this bag super comfortable to wear.

As itâ€™s a rucksack and since we are so security conscious with our designs, we have added a hidden zipped pocket at the back of the bag where your valuables can be kept if you are in a bad neck of the woods! Also this bag features a cool clip which allows for the backpack to be worn with the sparkle effect all over.

The shoulder straps can be adjusted by moving the buckles up or down.

On the inside there is two large pouch pockets for all your bits and pieces as well as a large secure inner zipped pocket. The pockets are trimmed with leather on the inside and the lining is constructed out of a very hardware silver colored polyester lining.
